name: President Man Baby! Election Year 2020
description:
PRESIDENT MAN-BABY -- ELECTION YEAR!

You are a man-baby who has somehow become president.

  • Fight the facts with tweets!
  • Blow kisses to Russian mobsters!
  • And of course, Steal that cash!

Be careful! Too much fact exposure and you will soil your diapers,  have a widdle tantrum, and the game will end.

CONTROLS

  • To send a tweet (tap top of screen / Press T-tweet)
  • To blow a kiss (tap lower screen / Press K-kiss)
  • To move left and right (Left and right arrows / tap left and right of screen)
